name: Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 2 - Revelations
description:
Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 2 - Revelations is an action game developed by Mercury Steam Entertainment. It came out on 25-03-2014. It was published by Konami. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 2 - Revelations is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
